thread.title: Greg Long, Coolangatta, Australia
thread.title_full: www.arguscarhire.com reviewed by Greg Long, Coolangatta, Australia

author: Greg Long, Coolangatta, Australia
title: Greg Long, Coolangatta, Australia
text:
I always shop around when hiring a car and Argus Car Hire consistently provide me the type of car I want, when I require with the best value for money and great customer service as well.
Their online booking procedure is fast, easy and effective
